sentence: ET The first votes are showing up in Georgias results, according to the New York Times, in the Senate GOP primary where Herschel Walker has as expected taken a commanding lead out the gate.
author: Matthew Boyle
title: *** Election Night Livewire *** Georgia, Alabama, Texas, Arkansas, Minnesota Vote in Key Primaries

sentence: In the race for Senate in Georgia, former football star Herschel Walker is expected to win the Republican primary, despite allegations of past violent behavior with women.
author: Isabel Martins
title: Primary Election Results for Georgia, Texas, Alabama and Other States
